comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: LT Conway C. Saux of the 62nd Fighter Squadron, 56th FG was at the controls of his assigned P-47C (serial 41-6224, coded LM-X) nicknamed 'Two Roll Charlie' when he had a midair collision with LT Donald Tettemer in P-47C serial 41-6189 (coded LM-P). Both pilots were killed.
